column4: hi. i have a problem with inkscape on ubuntu 8.04. after i have instaled it with add/remove, like usual, it was started only once by another user on this system. now the problem is that _no one_ can start inkscape again on this system, even with root privileges (had to try to be sure). what may be the reason? any sugestions to get it working? please...

try running strace inkscape and see if anything tell-tale shows up; also check the directory that inkscape is installed in (usually /usr/share/inkscape) and make sure it has the right permissions. Also you can try moving your ~/.inkscape  settings folder to ~/.inkscape.backup to see if that is the problem
